TestCase.Description: This test pull the /system/lib/ libraries from the DUT, then runs an scanelf command on them. This test requires "pax-utils" linux package to properly run.

Parameter.Name: white_list_libraries
Parameter.Value: libstagefright_soft_amrdec_mdp.so libstagefright_soft_amrenc_mdp.so libstagefright_soft_mp3dec_mdp.so libdvm.so libart.so libc_malloc_debug_leak.so libc_malloc_debug_qemu.so libhoudini.so libgcam.so libvorbisidec.so libcrypto.so libaudioresample.so libstagefright_soft_aacdec_mdp.so libstagefright_soft_aacenc_mdp.so libstagefright_soft_vorbisdec_mdp.so
